lyrics:
10 contributorsjust friends lyricsverse 1 nick jonas
there she goes again
the girl im in love with
its cool were just friends
we walk the halls at school
we know its casual
its cool were just
i dont wanna lead you on no
but the truth is ive grown fond yeah

everyone knows its meant to be
falling in love just you and me
til the end of time til im on her mind itll happen
ive been making lots of plans
like a picket fence and a rose garden
ill just keep on dreaming
but its cool cause were just friends

verse 2 nick jonas
small talk on im
just one word sentences

see jonas brothers liveget tickets as low as 30you might also likechorus nick jonas

falling in love just you and me
til the end of time til im on her mind itll happen
ive been making lots of plans
like a picket fence and a rose garden
ill just keep on dreaming

thinking about how

everyone knows its meant to be
